tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Mar. 1, 2021 at 11:15am EST At the #HAC meeting, Myra Burton and Louise Woodroofe will discuss the Carter administration’s policy toward Africa, as documented in #FRUS To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov https://t.co/rH44hDNGoY
